name: Alchemy Hunter
description:
This game was a tiny ... and perhaps more actuarately described as a lazy game I and three colleagues developed for a Master's Class, it is simply an endless runner .... which is endless.

There's no end, you can't loose ( exept for a a bug here and there) and honestly all it surves as is either to pass time if you are honestly bored... or if you which to get trippy as many people have descibred to get too happy playing it to the point of ending up a bit nauseated ... like weed.
